message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. It comes equipped with cutting-edge features designed to enhance efficiency and user experience. Considering its unparalleled value and benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15000. We believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to elevate your operations or personal use with this top-tier product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to accept the current price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your situation and respect your decision. In light of that, I am willing to consider your counteroffer. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am proposing a price of $12000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
